sentence: Sen. Mark Kelly, D-Ariz., also noted the manufacturing issue, while calling for inflation-fighting moves to aid Americans.
author: Ronald J. Hansen
title: Unity at start of Biden's State of the Union speech gives way to familiar domestic battles

sentence: Kyrsten Sinema, D-Ariz., and Mark Kelly, D-Ariz., oppose ending the policy without a "comprehensive, workable plan in place," saying the would overwhelm Arizona border communities and stretch the resources of nonprofits that are already near capacity.
author: Clara Migoya
title: What is Title 42 and how does it affect the Arizona border? The immigration policy, explained

sentence: Meanwhile, Senators Krysten Sinema and Mark Kelly of Arizona, Maggie Hassan of New Hampshire, Joe Manchin of West Virginia and Jon Tester of Montana have signed onto similar legislation in Congress' upper chamber.
author: Andrew Stanton
title: Henry Cuellar Becomes Sixth House Democrat to Oppose Biden Lifting Title 42
